annotations.description: At Lucy's Fried Chicken in Austin, Texas, local Republic Tequila Reposado is used in this Bee's Knees variation.
annotations.title: Bee Sting Recipe

textContent:
1 jalapeno slice, about 1/2 inch thick
1 1/2 ounces reposado tequila
3/4 ounce freshly squeezed lemon juice
3/4 ounce honey syrup
Garnish: jalapeno slice and lemon twist

Shake and strain into coup

https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/2012/03/bee-sting-tequila-bees-knees-recipe.html
title: Bee Sting
